TopicTitle: SSTO's, Heavy Lifters and More at M.A.X. AEROSPACE!

Articles.Content:
Welcome to the grand opening of M.A.X. AEROSPACE! After the old M.A.R.D.I. colapsed we bought the rights to their designs and now are putting them back on sale. We have Spaceplanes, Heavy Lifter and Space Stations.

Spaceplanes are the largest section of M.A.X. AEROSPACE and are our best selling products. We have:

The SP-1 is a renowned design based on the old Fun-1 series.

A great practical way to get into orbit, the SP-1 will do for most orbital missions.

The SP-1M is a modification of the SP-1 that has just enough range to get to the Mun.

A great SSTO design, the Fun-1D will easily put you into orbit and return safely.

A modification to the Fun-1D that drops off the jet engines after the atmospheric flight stage.

Rover NOT included.

The SS-5 is a large heavy lifter designed for interplanetary travel. It features a very nice skycrane system for the rover that can take it down from LKO with most of its fuel remaining.

Requires the cart mod

The Jool-1 is designed to reach and explore all Joovan bodies in one mission, and as such contains four rovers and two atmospheric probes. It uses the revolutionary new "asparagus stalk" booster configuration.

For more information including a flight plan visit:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/19059-The-Jool-1-from-M-A-X-AEROSPACE%21

Requires: Cart mod, MechJeb and Damned Robotics.

The J-1 is a new heavy lifter designed to bring record amounts of fuel up to orbit for long range trips.

For more information visit:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/19426-The-Interplanetary-J-1-0-16-cart?p=257212#post257212

Requires Cart Mod.

The massive DS-2 could be the pride of any space station fleet!

Requires Cart mod, Zoolotac escape mod, orbital construction mod, damned robotics, deep space missions pack, and the electricity plugin.

A much more practical station and refueling hub.

Requires deep space mission pack, electricity plugin, orbital construction mod and damned robotics.

Edited September 5, 2012 by Maxed-Rockets

Here are the remaining files not included in the original post!

Wow, loving the crafts. They all look nice and seem to be very practical. Especially loving those space stations though, look so much like actual space stations

Yep, it seems I am having the same problem aswell, I will try to fix it.
Also how did you get it in space

Sorry, forgot to mention the Zoolotac escape mod found here:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/17439-PLUGIN-PART-16-Zoolotac-EscapePod-v1-2?highlight=escape

The orbital construction mod is probably the only way to get them into space, it is here:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/9283-0-16-0-Plugin-Orbital-Planetary-Construction-V9-3?highlight=orbital+construction

Also how did you get it in space

If you have the Orbital construction mod, you can add a hyperdrive to a satellite in space, I did that and made it orbit, then I jumped to it and was in orbit already

If you have the Orbital construction mod, you can add a hyperdrive to a satellite in space, I did that and made it orbit, then I jumped to it and was in orbit already

That is how I did it, and the only practical way.

I only have one rocket that would be capable of lifting something this huge, and I have never completed a takeoff of that due to lag.
